entry.tran: 意志坚强的;坚持己见的
entry.def: Someone who is strong-willed has a lot of determination and always tries to do what they want, even though other people may advise them not to.

example.ex: He is a very determined and strong-willed person.
example.tran: 他是个有决心有毅力的人。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
